hero_desc: A personal operating system that combines every aspect of your life. Focus on what matters today, and forget the mental clutter with OneForMind.
eco_desc: Not just Habits. This is a complete toolkit to manage every aspect of your life in one single dashboard.
eco_habit_desc: The core feature. Build new habits with a daily checklist system. Visualize your streaks to stay motivated.
eco_finance_desc: Simple income & expense tracking. Stop the silent leaks in your wallet.
eco_daily_desc: Just today's To-Do List. Focus on what actually needs to get done right now.
eco_goal_desc: Break down big yearly dreams into reasonable and executable targets.
eco_journal_desc: Pour out your thoughts. Daily reflection to keep your mind sane.
eco_job_desc: Track your job applications (Sent, Interview, Offer) or schedule your social media posts.
prob_1_desc: Too many apps clutter the mind. Scattered tasks, finances, and habits everywhere only become a mental burden for you.
prob_1_point_1: Losing focus due to complicated systems.
prob_1_point_2: Burnout from switching between too many apps.
prob_2_desc: Habits on your phone, finances on your laptop, journal in a notebook. Your energy is drained just trying to remember which app to open.
prob_2_solution: OneForMind combines Habits, Finances, and Planners into one simple Dashboard.
sol_card_1_desc: Hassle-free daily checklists. Track your progress visually. Green means go, gray means skip.
sol_card_2_desc: Input expenses in just 3 seconds. 'Coffee - $2'. Done. See exactly where your money is leaking this month.
sol_card_3_desc: All the features you need, perfectly integrated. Give your mind room to breathe without fragmented apps.
about_desc: An honest story about burnout, red notifications, and the search for sanity in a digital world.
story_1_p1: Our phones used to be filled with productivity apps. Trello for work, Notion for notes, Excel for finances. We thought it made us productive.
story_1_p2: The reality? We became slaves to the apps. We spent more time 'managing' the system than actually getting things done.
story_2_p1: We realized something was wrong. Modern apps force us to run a marathon with no finish line. Miss one task, and rigid systems instantly kill your motivation.
story_2_quote: We need a system that forgives, not one that punishes.
story_2_p2: Finally, we created OneForMind. A calm ecosystem that unites all your productivity needs without the overwhelm.
manifesto_1_desc: Your data is your business. We are not an ad company. We don't sell your habit data to third parties.
manifesto_2_desc: One dashboard for everything. You no longer need to open multiple apps just to log finances, habits, and schedules.
manifesto_3_desc: Anti-bloatware. We only include features you genuinely need to keep your life organized. No tacky gamification.
dev_desc: Built solo out of frustration with complicated habit apps. I coded this to solve my own problems, and hopefully, it helps you too.
user_desc: The first users brave enough to try this system. The ones reporting bugs at 2 AM and pitching crazy feature ideas. You aren't just users; you're Co-Founders.
team_connect: Want to discuss features or just vent about burnout?
cta_about_desc: Time to stop scrolling and start organizing your life. It only takes 2 minutes to set up.
cta_about_sub: No Credit Card Required. Cancel anytime.
cta_final_desc: Don't wait until later to get organized. Start now, regain your focus. Risk-free.
faq_a1: Absolutely. All your data is securely stored in the cloud. You can look back at your finance or habit history anytime for evaluation.
faq_a2: Yes. The Habit & Finance Tracker features you see now are FREE. We will release Premium features later, but the core foundation will remain free.
faq_q3: Can I use it on my phone?
faq_a3: Definitely! This website is fully responsive. If you open it in mobile Chrome/Safari, it feels just like a native app.
